subtitles.text: Eons ago, a mage defied the gods by traversing the Path of the Stars, where each portal promised power and a wish at the journey's end.
But his desire was too great, and his power unleashed a cataclysm.
The gods sealed the knowledge of the Path in the Grimoire of the Stars, so that no one would repeat his mistake.
Centuries later, the world had forgotten the legend...
